text: Today, Cheryl Cole took to social media to wish her baby daddy Liam Payne a very happy first Father ’ s Day! As fans may already be aware, the singer gave birth to their son Bear back in March. Cheryl posted a black and white photo of the former One Direction singer and captioned it : ‘ Happy 1st Father ’ s Day Liam. You are the most amazing daddy and the best example for our son. The way he looks at you says it all. Your relationship melts my heart. You are the center of his world and we adore you. ’ Happy 1st Father's Day Liam..
